name: get_channel_points_context
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool twitch_api.
Tool description: Detailed API for twitch. Stream data, streamer data, chat data, streamer cards data etc.
for twitch.
API description: Fetches the channel points context for a given Twitch channel using the provided RapidAPI key.

channel.description: The name of the Twitch channel for which to fetch the channel points context.
